casebody.data:
Harriet A. Mead, as Executrix, &c., Appellant, v. Hugh J. Grant, as Sheriff, &c., Respondent. Decided December 30, 1886. Appeal from judgment. John Brooks Leavitt, for appellant. Cockran & Clark, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
